Reviews.Content: It's a small TV and relatively inexpensive, but just right for a spare/guest bedroom.  The picture is great - I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: 24" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: We got this tv for our son for a Christmas gift.  It is only hooked up to a DVD player but the picture is fantastic.  He absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: 24-inch tv
Reviews.Author: Super gramma
Reviews.Content: Never heard of this brand, but good price. works great picture is good. I am satisfied with this product. Husband was happy with it also.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. It was easy to set up and trust me when I say that I am not technologically inclined. It has been working great.

Reviews.Title: Codes for direct tv
Reviews.Author: tavegas "tavegas"
Reviews.Content: I got one of these sets and direct tv has no listing of it to program the Sat. remote, if you use 11447 it wil allow vol and on / off to work. also it is wall mountable . I had to make a 8" on center bracket and bolt it to my standard bracket. you can also buy this bracket but is not very easy to find. nice set for the low price. hope it lasts a few years .

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal
Reviews.Author: johnoca
Reviews.Content: I didnt know what to expect at first when I purchased this tv on a $160 deal. I thought it would be a really cheap tv since I had never heard of this brand. But I got it and I love it. Its pretty stylish. The picture and colors are good. Although the only thing is that When I play my Xbox 360 on it it sorta gets a bit blury when theres fast movement but you get used to it after a while and dont even notice it anymore. Its a great tv for the price. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Ted Clayton
Reviews.Content: Even after purchasing I was skeptical because I've never heard of the brand, but after some research and having the TV at home - I was incredibly happy!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Connelly
Reviews.Content: I got this during the Black Friday/Cyber Monday deals, and so for the money, this was an excellent deal.  This is not a high-end television, so the picture is not going to blow you away, but everything works well.  The sound, as some have mentioned, is not that great, but it is serviceable for secondary use (in a bedroom, kitchen, etc.).  There are a lot of ports on the back, which is very nice.My biggest complaint is the stand.  I still don't trust that I have it set up correctly.  You have to screw metal screws through plastic, and it just all feels unstable.  I would have been much happier with a simpler stand - monitors this size come with easy-to-use stands all the time.  No idea what they were thinking with this stand.Overall, a great product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Winston Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a Christmas present for my wife. She watches a lot of TV, while I only watch Survivor. This unit is a man's dream. It has more connections than a Bourbon Street Bellhop. You can even take it hunting or fishing as it runs on 12v. 3.5 AMPS. The picture is super clear, the menus are simple. Even has a screen saver. This is the best TV I have ever seen, and I come from the time of little round fuzzy screens, that had to be watched in dark living rooms. If this one goes dark, I wouldn't hesitate to buy another. My understanding is, this brand is the one built for local consumption in China. The TV we are replacing is an Emerson LCD with a built in DVD player. The two year warranty should satisfy those who are worried about name brand recognition, but the way I see it, they are most likely built in the same factory.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Nute
Reviews.Content: I purchased this LED HD TV through a Gold Box deal for $150 and free shipping (full price $400).  It was bought to sit in a special  armoire shelf in my personal study. I rarely watch television in my study, so the TV will get little use. I do think it has an amazing picture and features for the price, plus it comes with a 2 year warranty  I'm a very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal, TCL LE24FHDD20 24-Inch 1080p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: JustNetGirl
Reviews.Content: I got this TV with Lightening Deal for $159 on Black Friday. It arrived in 4 days. It took about 25 mins to get the set screwed into the base. We had to lay the tv down at the edge of the bed, and push the base up to the TV. We used the Philips screwdriver, but it was tight getting screws in, and we did not want to crack it. So we took our time.I bought this to replace a 27" flat screen that I got 8 yrs ago. It took up so much space in my room. I have it set against the wall opposite my bed. Color and quality are great. The sound is good to me, but I am not into the home theater sound stuff, so your miles may vary. Speakers are in the back, and my son says he can hear it in the living room through the ducts, so I think sound is good.My son set up the channels for DirecTV.The remote uses AAA batteries. I did not see that the remote came with them, so I went out and bought some. A few days later, I found them on the floor, they must have come out of the box.At the time I purchased this TV, there were no instructions on how to set it up with the DirecTV remote. When I came to write this review, I see some people have giving some hints. I tried the one for DirecTV and it did not work, and I could not find a place to type in TCL.Someone posted the code for Dish TV, and I tried that.This is what I did:1) Press Menu on your DirecTV remote.2) Select Parental, Fav's & Setup3) Select System Setup4) Select Remote Control5) Program Remote6) Select  TV7) Select RCA8) Move mode switch to TV9) Press Mute & Select until light over TV mode flashes twice.10) I used code 11547 then pressed volume up. It worked.(There are other codes listed to use, if this one does not work for you)This step is important, because I missed it the first time.If the volume did work, Repeat Press Mute & Select until light over TV mode flashes twice and enter code 960 then press TV INPUT bottom. Try volume again.If volume goes up, Move switch out of TV mode and back to DirecTV mode and select Done. Also the DirecTV remote has to be aim properly to move the volume. It only works from the right side of the room, or straight from my bed.I had $50 in Amazon GCs so I paid $109 for this tv, and I am pretty happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Rivera
Reviews.Content: I loved my tcl tv.  I was not sure of the brand before I bought it but I have had no issues.  The Picture is amazing, good sound.  Sits on a glass stand (which is super easy to assemble).  Very thin TV, light weight.  The cable was good lenth too, and easy to setup.

Reviews.Title: Ok For The Price
Reviews.Author: Warrant
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a lightning deal during Cyber Week frenzy.  Got it for my bedroom to replace an older small set.Assembly of the base plate was quick and easy, be careful putting the screws in so you don't strip the plastic base.  Power cord has an attached power supply, simliar to a laptop.  Remote does not come with AAA batteries, but I had some laying around.  Initial powerup and setup requires the normal stuff; language, source, etc, plugged it into the coaxial in the wall (no cable box in between) and selected channel scan.  It surprisingly detected "digital" channels on my cable system and put them into the channel ineup.  My previous set was an older tubed set and never detected these channels.  Now, I have a few new digital channels, some HD, and they are sprinkled throught the lineup.  The set is wide-screen, so any channels that are not that format will come in as a smaller square box with a surrounding black border.  It automatically detects the digital wide-screen channels and adjust the picture.  The remote has a button so you can cycle through various types of views to adjust the picture (normal, zoom, wide, etc).  You can also select various inputs, TV, HDMI, PC, etc.  The back has various audio and video inputs to connect peripherals.The picture takes significant tweaking to find a good view - this is my first LED tv so I'm finding it's much different and difficult than the older and simpler sets.  The blacks are very dark, and it seemes to bleed over to other colors.  I had to mess with the contrast to get colors and details separated.  There are a few automatic settings like Sports, Natural, Sharp, Cinema and they adjust the colors and contrast accordingly.  I'm also seeing a slight shadowing effect on the images, so I will need to tweak this even further.Sound is worse than my older set, coming from 2 small speakers on the bottom and possibly 2 on the back, although I suspect those are air vents and not speakers.  Even though I've set it to stereo, it still sounds slightly mono.  There is an audio setting page to adjust the 5 channels, but they seem to have little effect.  Bass and treble are barely there.  I'm considering adding some PC speakers, maybe a subwoofer to boost the sound.This is an ok set to do occasional viewing or maybe a kids room, but if you want a quality picture with good sound, go with a different set.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: salman azad
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my kitchen.  I set it up in my office just to see how it looks first.  I liked it so much that I don't want to remove it.  I wish I got another one.  The sound and picture quality are good for what I need.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Tommy Boy "DJT"
Reviews.Content: First off the shipping came in 3 days sooner than promised.The TV is a better deal than I thought it would be. I got it on a lightning deal. The TV looks great and seems well designed. It has a flat front surface like an LG or Samsung. The base is black metal and the TV is supported by clear acrylic post - kind of cool! For a 24" TV HD LED - you can't beat this one.

Reviews.Title: hdtv led
Reviews.Author: Bethany
Reviews.Content: this little tv is loaded with features and can talk to me around the house. and is light enough for me to move around on my own.it is great! fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great Low-Price LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Brian R. Stuart
Reviews.Content: If you are looking at this TV, then you surely aren't expecting a home theatre caliber of TV.  You are hoping for a good value...and this is the TV.  Priced well less than comporable TVs of name brand and even low end brands, this is a good value.  It is very thin, good size, good quality picture, decent sound, tons of connections, and a 2 year warranty.  Can't miss with this one...assuming you have realistic expectations for a 24" TV

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive, but not cheap.
Reviews.Author: Frybot
Reviews.Content: Like most on Amazon, I bought this during the Lightning Deals on Black Friday for $169.99.  After having the TV for a little bit, I can honestly say I would easily pay $200 for this set.  This is my first HDTV so everything is MUCH better for me coming from SD.  PS3 looks fantastic as well as my laptop.  Both of which display natively at 1080p, but when I first plugged in my laptop it was at 720p.  A simple display change fixed that and it now goes straight to 1080p every time I plug it in.  The remote is a little stiff but is still responsive. I went ahead and programmed my cable box remote to it so that's no big deal.  The speakers aren't much so I bought a $25 3.1 Altech Lansing set from Walmart to fix that issue.  I'm not taking a star away for the speakers because the TV is so thin, I can't expect them to sound great.  The base is glass and is very sturdy.  A Philips screw driver will secure the three screw to the base without any problems.  All in all, it's an excellent TV.  I'm actually thinking about buying a couple more for the second bedroom and kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Can NOT be mounted even though Amazon offers the mount as an accessory
Reviews.Author: Dear Miss Mermaid "Dear Miss Mermaid"
Reviews.Content: UPDATED November 2012I love this TV, I've had it a year now. I did finally get it attached to the articulating wall mount I bought from Amazon.  It has been in my motorhome traveling around with me for over a year. Once I realized the instructions for mounting the TV and for mounting the bracket to the TV were totally wrong and unreliable... I tossed them aside, then  I spent a few days of "trial and error" with the zillion parts supplied with the universal articulating mount.Eventually I ended up with a secure stable mount on the wall and the TV. I am able to adjust it for precise viewing depending on where I want to sit or lay or relax.The TV has awesome color and sound. I use it for both TV reception and I have a computer hooked up to it. Since I mounted mine to the universal articulating wall mount, I was able to toss the heavy table base that came with the TV. The TV itself is very light. It has really been put to the test bouncing down thousands of miles of country roads.Great TV, I think TCL makes a wonderful product, just that this one came with a weird wall mount.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Previous review:I bought this to mount in my motorhome. Forget it!  The "VESA compatible" spaces for mounting it are 200mm x 35mm.  There is NOTHING on the market that will fit that mounting pattern. The extension arms on the articulating mount that Amazon insisted would work with it, make the mount too big to mount with only 35mm spacing. I called Amazon 3 times, they kept referring me to another phone number for help, but everyone kept saying the articulating mount bought with it (Amazon Basics) would work and it does not.I called the TCL manufacturer and they were of zero help about the wall mount. They insist it is compatible with standard VESA mounts but it is not.I am extremely frustrated all around with this purchase.It wobbles on the glass base, when assembled and the little legs beneath the glass base fell right off as if never glued on to start with.I have been a shopper at Amazon since they first opened. I am so disappointed all around.I see now why Amazon had it so cheap on Black Friday.The TV itself plays well and has the bonus of a computer hookup, which surprisingly works really well.The sleep timer which is a must-have for me, is very hard to find in the menu, you have to push over 20  buttons to finally access and set it.The TV comes with little LED lights you don't need, but the remote comes with no lights which you do need unless you watch TV with all the bright overhead lights on all the time.Now I have to go to the total hassle of returning the Amazon wall mount they sold me that is worthless and UPS doesn't want to come out to where I am camped in the country, so I have to drive 32 miles to a UPS office to ship it off. I am not at all amused.At this point, I can't decide whether to keep the TV or not. But I have to return the mount that Amazon insists will fit it, but does not.If you buy this TV, just buy it for a table, certainly not for mounting. Expect to glue the little legs back on the glass base as mine fell off the first day.

Reviews.Title: Not good to mount on wall
Reviews.Author: Mark Applegate
Reviews.Content: PROS: Pricing on this is good, espcially if you can get it on sale like I did for $160.  The menu setup is nice and easy to use.CONS:  Do not buy this if you are planning on mounting it on the wall.  There are two screw points if you use these ridiculous attachements.  I'm pretty creative and made it work, also because I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it and waiting for another more expensive TV, but if I had to do it again I would not have bought this TV.  Picture quality is descent but not as good as I expected.

Reviews.Title: TCL is the worst company
Reviews.Author: tclsucks
Reviews.Content: We bought a 40 inch TCL tv off of amazon in February and once we received the tv the remote didn't work. We tried new batteries and then eventually called the company. We called at least ten times and being told every time they would send a remote. This went on for 4 months. Finally, they sent a new remote, and then that didn't solve the problem. The tv is useless because we couldn't set up the tv without the remote. So we call back, being on hold for at least 20 minutes every call, and then they lost our information in the system so we had to start all over. 7 months after our initial calls we received new parts and a shipping label to send back, so it will probably take 3-4 months for us to even use this tv. I would never buy from TCL again, and they have shown to be the worst customer service company I have ever been in contact with. THE WORST COMPANY

Reviews.Title: Happy with TV, but needs solid wall-mounting option.
Reviews.Author: Nelsito
Reviews.Content: I also purchased this TV during the Lighting Deals of Black Friday week. The picture is very bright and colors are very rich. Settings are pretty much user-friendly. The tuner is able to pick up regular channels from the cable service, without a box, as well as a fair amount of over-the-air digital channels. The sound is adequate for our bedroom setting, which is where they are located. I'm very glad with the fact that the TV is basically a 12V device so it's pretty efficient at power consumption. I actually bought two of these sets for my kid's bedrooms.There is one thing, however, that has me having second thoughts; it has no standard VESA hookups for a wall mount. There are 4 screw holes on the back of the unit, arranged in a rectangular shape, 35mm apart vertically and 200mm apart horizontally. The TV comes with two small bracket adapters. Each bracket gets attached to each of the vertically-arranged set of screws and, in turn, each bracket provides one screw hole for a wall mount, for a total of 2 screw holes available. This means that, from what I've gathered so far, the TV is supposed to be held by only those two screws, as opposed to 4, like a standard VESA wall mount bracket. I purchased these TV's with the intention of wall-mounting them to save some space. Probably the only reason why I won't give it a 5 star rating of satisfaction is the fact that I haven't been able to locate a suitable wall mount. I even wrote a note on the TCLUSA.com website about the issue, but so far no response.If anyone out there has found away to hang this TV to a wall, that I can't seem to figure out, please let me know. Hopefully I'm not the only one in this predicament.

Reviews.Title: Poor Viewing angle, and poor sound
Reviews.Author: D. Suslavich
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on Black Friday to replace an older Dell 19" LCD TV.  I received it on Monday,, and was eager to set it up. When I received it, I hooked it up via HDMI to my DirecTV DVR, and was very impressed with the picture when looking straight at the screen, however as soon as you moved left or right, the picture became washed out and dim, which is something even the old Dell doesn't suffer from. I could have lived with that, however, the speakers on the unit sounded hollow and tinny,, which turned out to be the deal breaker for me. I returned the TV on Tuesday,, and will be looking for another brand to try.On a positive note, I do want to note that the glass base was very heavy and sturdy,, and for a 24" TV, TCL managed to include more ports than you ever will manage to use,.

Reviews.Title: Color was no good for photos and photo editing
Reviews.Author: Mark Thiel "Mark Thiel"
Reviews.Content: I'm returning this tv.  I really wanted to use an HDTV as a computer monitor, but I've tried several tvs now, and I've got to go with a dedicated monitor, the ViewSonic 24 inch 1080p LED monitor, which has beautiful, true colors and crisp text.The TCL photos were yellowish and reddish.  The reds really blew out. Could not achieve a proper flesh tone at all -- people were VERY yellow.

Reviews.Title: Bad audio with arcing noise, picture is ok
Reviews.Author: Ming Lu
Reviews.Content: I got it yesterday, turned it on, picture looks ok but the sound comes out with the arcing noise. I thought it is my video, so I tried on different media, but it still come with the arcing noise. Price is cheap, but quality is not good. You pay what you get. The body is of TV is kind of loose. Good warranty but you don't want to pay for an electronic equipment that play ok on video with bad sound. I would like to pay additional $50 dollars for the better known brand.

Reviews.Title: Okay. Could be better.
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I bought this particular make/model because it was one of the few flat screens that in this price range and size that includes a headphone jack (weird!). Being able to use noise-cancelling headphones for this TV (to be placed in my bedroom) was imperative.Pros-- price-- headphone jackCons-- the color presets are absolutely AWFUL. It took quite a bit of tinkering to get my "personal" option set to an acceptable level and still the red is too vivid.-- the above complaint is made worse if the screen is not viewed directly head-on (i.e. placing this on a tall dresser made every scene too dark when viewed from bed-level; I've remedied the situation by tilting the TV downward with a book propped under the back of the stand [classy!])-- BEWARE: this TV is not compliant with most current universal remotes (in my case, my Time Warner Cable remote). The manual plainly states that this is the case. Had I known this beforehand, I may not have purchased this make/model.

Reviews.Title: this tv is NOT VESA mount compatable
Reviews.Author: Mike Luppino
Reviews.Content: despite what they say, this Tv does NOT have a VESA 200 mount pattern on it.  You will NOT be able to mount to the wall without expensive adapters. I ordered the mount with the Tv, had to pay to ship and to ship back! I did not pay to ship the Tv and I will return that as well on principle. If a mount exist for it, Amazon should list it with the Item. I bought the mount that came up on the page with the Item. It should have fit, instead I've been playing around with packaging, shipping etc and don't have a Tv!! I'm going to BEST BUY. I'll be hooked up in an hour! The User guide also says that the Tv uses a VESA 200. It does not! It has it's own 2 bracket mount not even close to 200mm. If they lie about a VESA mount, what else do they lie about their product? It is going back!!!
